entry.value: SELECT SOURCE_DIRECTORY srcDir,PROCESSED_DIRECTORY procDir,UNPROCSSED_DIRECTORY unProcDir,ACK_DIRECTORY ackDir,WORKING_DIRECTORY workingDir FROM TPMS.T_FIELD_MAPPING WHERE FILE_TYPE=:FILE_TYPE AND AGENCY_ID =:AGENCY_ID AND FILE_FORMAT =:FILE_FORMAT

SELECT FIELD_TYPE, CHARACTER_ENCODING characterEncoding,FIELD_NAME,START_POSITION,END_POSITION,VALIDATION_TYPE,VALIDATION_VALUE,FIELD_INDEX_POSITION,IS_POJO_VALUE,DEFAULT_VALUE,FILE_LEVEL_REJECTION FROM TPMS.T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL INNER JOIN TPMS.T_FIELD_MAPPING T_FIELD_MAPPING ON T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL.FIELD_MAPPING_PK_ID=T_FIELD_MAPPING.ID WHERE AGENCY_ID =:AGENCY_ID ORDER BY FIELD_INDEX_POSITION
SELECT XFER_FILE_NAME,XFER_CONTROL_ID FROM MASTER.T_XFER_CONTROL where XFER_FILE_NAME =:XFER_FILE_NAME
SELECT NVL(FILE_CONTROL_ID, 0) FROM T_FO_FILE_STATS WHERE TRX_FILE_NAME = :IN_TRX_FILE_NAME
SELECT TRX_FILE_NAME, NVL(FILE_CONTROL_ID, 0) FROM T_FO_FILE_STATS WHERE DISTRIB_FILE_NAME = :IN_DIST_FILE_NAME

SELECT FO.TRX_FILE_NAME, NVL(FO_RC.FILE_CONTROL_ID, 0) FROM T_FO_FILE_STATS FO, T_FO_RECON_FILE_STATS FO_RC WHERE FO_RC.FO_RECON_FILENAME = :IN_RECON_FILE_NAME AND FO_RC.FILE_CONTROL_ID = FO.FILE_CONTROL_ID

select FO.TRX_FILE_NAME, NVL(FO_RC.FILE_CONTROL_ID, 0) from T_FO_FILE_STATS FO, T_FO_RECON_FILE_STATS FO_RC where FO_RC.EPS_RECON_FILENAME = :IN_RECON_FILE_NAME and FO_RC.FILE_CONTROL_ID = FO.FILE_CONTROL_ID
select NVL(FO.FILE_CONTROL_ID, 0) from T_FO_FILE_STATS FO, T_FO_RECON_FILE_STATS FO_RC where FO.TRX_FILE_NAME = :IN_TRX_FILE_NAME and FO_RC.FILE_CONTROL_ID = FO.FILE_CONTROL_ID
SELECT NVL(FO_RC.FILE_CONTROL_ID, 0) FROM T_FO_RECON_FILE_STATS FO_RC WHERE FO_RC.TRX_EPS_FILENAME = :IN_TRX_FILE_NAME
SELECT IS_HOME_AGENCY FROM CRM.V_AGENCY WHERE DEVICE_PREFIX= :IN_DEVICE_PREFIX_LCA
SELECT ACK_FILE_NAME FROM TPMS.T_IA_ACK_STATUS where ACK_FILE_NAME =:ACK_FILE_NAME
SELECT ACK_FILE_NAME FROM TPMS.T_IA_ACK_STATUS WHERE ACK_FILE_NAME=:ACK_FILE_NAME
